root.name: Sorcery Saga: Curse of the Great Curry God
root.description: OverviewSei Madou Monogatari is a top down view dungeon crawler RPG developed by Zerodiv for the PlayStation Vita. It is part of the Madou Monogatari franchise that started in 1989, this being the first console entry since a Saturn game in 1998, but will feature a new cast as the rights to the previous characters belong to Sega. The game will have a large world for the players to explore, with diverse dungeons with randomly generated floor layouts.It was originally published in Japan on March 28, 2013 by Compile Heart, and has since been licensed by Aksys Games for North American release in December 2013, while Rising Star Games will put the tile out in Europe in early 2014.
